title: Jessica Mauboy confirms her engagement to longtime boyfriend Themeli Magripilis
text:
Jessica Mauboy has confirmed her engagement, revealing she's set to marry her longtime boyfriend, Themeli Magripilis.

The 30-year-old singer shared a rare photo with her boyfriend of over 10 years on Instagram on Wednesday.

She said they had gotten engaged during a recent holiday in Greece, visiting Themeli's family.

Making it official: Jessica Mauboy has finally confirmed her engagement, revealing she's set to marry her longtime boyfriend, Themeli Magripilis

'The love of my life proposed to me in his family’s home town of Kalymnos, Greece on the beach at sunset,' she announced.

'We are so happy. I can’t wait to spend the rest of my life with my best friend. Thank you for all the love. BIG LOVE JM & Themeli'.

Jessica was asked about the engagement as she arrived at Sydney Airport on Tuesday, and confessed it was unexpected.

Ring it on: Rumours emerged the couple were engaged after Themeli shared a photo of Jessica lying on the shoreline on a beach in Greece with a ring on her finger

'It is very exciting. It was a big surprise in fact, it was pretty crazy!' she told waiting paparazzi.

And she confessed they were yet to set a date, claiming the wedding would happen 'in the future, but not that soon'.

Rumours emerged the couple were engaged after Themeli shared a photo of Jessica lying on the shoreline on a beach in Greece.

Young love: The couple first met on a dance floor in Darwin when Jessica was just 18, and they were in a long distance relationship until three years ago, when Themeli relocated to Sydney to be with her

She wore a black bikini, and a prominent diamond ring adorned her left wedding finger.

'My paradise,' he simply captioned the photo.

The couple first met on a dance floor in Darwin when Jessica was just 18, and they were in a long distance relationship until three years ago, when Themeli relocated to Sydney to be with her.

Wedding talk: Jessica had dodged questions about whether she and Themeli were engaged in recent months, but confessed it was something they had spoken about

Jessica had dodged questions about whether she and Themeli were engaged in recent months, but confessed it was something they had spoken about.

'[We're] not engaged,' she told Nova 106.9's Fitzy & Wippa in April.

'There has been conversations about it, like walking down the aisle and doing the whole thing - but not yet.'

Getting married: In a 2017 interview with Who magazine, she revealed marriage was definitely on the cards for the couple

And in a 2017 interview with Who magazine, she revealed marriage was definitely on the cards for the couple.

'I love the idea of having children with Themeli. I love the idea of being married to him,' she said at the time.

She added: 'We already kind of are.'
description: Jessica Mauboy has finally confirmed her engagement, revealing she's set to marry her boyfriend, Themeli Magripilis. The 30-year-old singer shared a rare photo with her boyfriend.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
